content.question: A. Explain how land-use patterns contribute to the cultural landscape shown in Image 1. B. Describe TWO ways that local cultural practices may be affected by large-scale processes to produce new forms of cultural ideas. C. Explain a limitation of using the images to understand how sovereignty relates to the cultural landscape shown in Image 1 or Image 2. D. Explain how the use of the English language relates to cultural convergence between the United Kingdom and India. E. Explain the degree to which differences within a country’s cultural landscape can relate to the process of devolution.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
